# MLComputeUnits.all

**Case**

The option you choose to allow the model to use all compute units available, including the neural engine.

## Declaration

```swift
case all
```

## Processing Unit Configurations

- **MLComputeUnits.cpuOnly**: The option you choose to limit the model to only use the CPU.
- **MLComputeUnits.cpuAndGPU**: The option you choose to allow the model to use both the CPU and GPU, but not the neural engine.
- **MLComputeUnits.cpuAndNeuralEngine**: The option you choose to allow the model to use both the CPU and neural engine, but not the GPU.
